comment.author: 11151551@N08
comment._content:
The "TEKOA" a cargo vessel, was build in 1890 for New Zealand Shipping Co., Ltd., Plymouth, BR
Build by W. Gray & Co., Ltd., West Hartlepool, yard number 394
Measurements : 365.1 x 47.1 Feet, 4,050 GRT.
Engine : 1 Triple Expansio Steam engine, which gave her a speed of 10 knots.
Sold in 1902 as "HIGHLAND CORRIE" to  Nelson Line (Liverpool), Ltd. (H. & W. Nelson, Ltd.), London
Broken up at Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht, Holland, April 1909, by Frank Rijsdijk.
